title: Zoia's Gold
description: A tale based on the life of the Romanov court artist, Madame Zoia, finds down-on-his-luck art dealer Marcus Elliot overseeing the sale of the enigmatic late artist's works and uncovering facts about her dramatic private life, from her escape from Bolshevik torturers to her relationships with a series of devoted men. 35,000 first printing.
author: Philip Sington
